html.p: This dashboard helps determine a user's log on expereice including Group Policy processing and Client Side Extension load times. Enter a user name below and press the Search button to select a user's log on instance to inspect.

table.searchString: `xd_winevents_index` sourcetype="WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-GroupPolicy/Operational" UserName="$username$" Id=4001 | table UserName TimeCreated host ActivityId | rename UserName AS "User Name" TimeCreated AS "Logon Time" host AS "Server"
table.title: User Sessions
